Support Options for GemBox.Spreadsheet Free


On the following page you can download the latest hot fixes for GemBox.Spreadsheet Free: http://www.gemboxsoftware.com/Spreadsheet/Free/GBSBugFixesFree.htm

Hot fixes are in the form of ZIP archives containing fixed DLL and updated XML file used for Visual Studio intellisense.


GemBox Software does not provide technical support to the users of the Free version. To purchase the Professional version (which comes with technical support) go to: http://www.gemboxsoftware.com/spreadsheet/pricelist
